Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.view.Components

Class BoardView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
com.example.miniproyecto4.view.Components.BoardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoardView, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class BoardView extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements IBoardView
Visual representation of a game board in the Battleship game. Manages a grid of CellView components and provides methods to update cell states for hits, misses, ships, and sunk ships. Includes continuous ship rendering across multiple cells for enhanced visuals.

    Methods inherited from interface javafx.css.Styleable

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardView

      public BoardView(int size, double cellSize)
      Constructs a new BoardView with the specified size and cell dimensions. Creates layered panes for cells and ships, initializes the grid.
      Parameters:
      size - the number of cells in each dimension (width and height)
      cellSize - the pixel size of each cell

  • Method Details

    • drawContinuousShip

      public void drawContinuousShip(IShip ship)
      Draws a complete ship across multiple cells as one continuous graphic. The ship is rendered as a single visual element spanning its coordinates. Creates different ship designs based on ship size.
      Parameters:
      ship - the ship to draw on the board

    • removeShipGraphic

      public void removeShipGraphic(IShip ship)
      Removes the continuous ship graphics from the board. Clears ship visuals while preserving hits, misses, and sunk states. Used when toggling ship visibility or resetting the board.
      Parameters:
      ship - the ship to remove from visual display

    • getCell

      public CellView getCell(int x, int y)
      Gets the cell view at the specified grid coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate in the grid (0-based)
      y - the y coordinate in the grid (0-based)
      Returns:
      the CellView at that position, or null if out of bounds

    • getCell

      public CellView getCell(Coordinate coordinate)
      Gets the cell view at the specified coordinate object.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate to get the cell from
      Returns:
      the CellView at that coordinate, or null if out of bounds

    • drawCell

      public void drawCell(Coordinate coordinate, String color)
      Draws a cell with a specific color.
      Specified by:
      drawCell in interface IBoardView
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to color
      color - the color to apply in hexadecimal format

    • markHit

      public void markHit(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as hit by a shot. Displays hit visual effects on the cell.
      Specified by:
      markHit in interface IBoardView
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • markMiss

      public void markMiss(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as a miss (shot but no ship). Displays miss visual indicator on the cell.
      Specified by:
      markMiss in interface IBoardView
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • markShip

      public void markShip(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as containing a ship. Note: Ships are now drawn as continuous graphics via drawContinuousShip(). This method is kept for interface compatibility.
      Specified by:
      markShip in interface IBoardView
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • markSunk

      public void markSunk(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as part of a sunk ship. Displays sunk ship visual effects on the cell.
      Specified by:
      markSunk in interface IBoardView
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all cells and ship graphics from the board. Resets the board to its initial empty state.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface IBoardView

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes all cell visualizations on the board.
      Specified by:
      refresh in interface IBoardView
